titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that a taxpayer may elect to include in income crop insurance proceeds and disaster payments in the year of the disaster or in the following year, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/5/1995--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a taxpayer reporting on the cash receipts and disbursements method of accounting to elect to include in income crop insurance proceeds and disaster payments in the year of the disaster or in the following year.
